definition: to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: It's easier to drink with no fishy taste .
sentences.chinese: 去除了鱼类原有的鱼腥味，变得更为容易饮用。

sentences.english: Standards for drinking water have been improved continuously.
sentences.chinese: 饮用水水质标准不断进行完善。

sentences.english: More than 50 people in the Libyan capital Tripoli have died after drinking tainted alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 利比亚首都的黎波里50多人饮用毒酒身亡。

sentences.english: The water in bathroom need to be boiled for drinking.
sentences.chinese: 卫生间内的水要烧开后才能饮用。

sentences.english: Can drink lemon tea before and after exercise.
sentences.chinese: 可以饮用柠檬茶，练习前后。

sentences.english: Recommendations with red meat, grilled and cooked cheese.
sentences.chinese: 建议搭配红肉，烧烤和熟奶酪饮用。

sentences.english: The Environmental Protection Agency does not regulate manganese under the Safe Drinking Water Act.
sentences.chinese: 环境保护机构没有按照安全饮用水法案规范锰的含量。

sentences.english: Drink hot soup or a large number of drinking water, with dilutes alcohol concentration.
sentences.chinese: 多喝热汤或大量饮用开水，用以冲淡酒精的浓度。

sentences.english: A cytogenetic monitoring has been made on peasants who drank the contaminated well water long time.
sentences.chinese: 本文对该县饮用污染井水农民进行了细胞遗传学监测。

sentences.english: Landfills can contaminate drinking-water if they not properly constructed.
sentences.chinese: 废渣填埋地如果构建不当则可能污染饮用水。

sentences.english: German dishes washed down with beer.
Drink hot ginger tea when your fever gets too bothersome.
sentences.chinese: 当你烧得太厉害时，饮用热姜茶。

sentences.english: In the very good vintages it is an opulently rich and fruity wine, easy to drink when young.
sentences.chinese: 也是一款在年轻时已适合饮用的葡萄酒。

sentences.english: We distilled the salt water and made it into drinking water.
sentences.chinese: 我们蒸馏海水使其变成饮用水。

sentences.english: You'd better drink the boiled water.

definition: to add water (or other liquid) to (another ingredient such as powdered milk or tea leaves)/to infuse (tea)
to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
to dissipate the effects of alcohol
